ETYMOLOGY: From the verb 'rub' + '-er' suffix, referring to its original use for rubbing out pencil marks. First applied to the material from the late 18th century.

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A noun is a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A tough, elastic polymeric substance, made from latex of certain plants or artificially, used in tires, seals, shoes, and many other products.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一种坚韧、有弹性的聚合物，由某些植物的乳胶或人工合成，用于轮胎、密封件、鞋子以及许多其他产品。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The soles of his shoes are made of durable rubber.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 他鞋子的鞋底是用耐用的橡胶制成的。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A noun is a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A small piece of rubber or other material used to erase pencil marks or ink.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一小块橡胶或其他材料，用于擦掉铅笔痕迹或墨水。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: I need a rubber to clean up this drawing.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 我需要一块橡皮擦来整理这幅画。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A noun is a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: (Slang, chiefly US) A condom, a thin sheath worn on the penis during sex as contraception or to prevent sexually transmitted infections.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: (俚语，主要用于美式英语) 避孕套，一种在性交时戴在阴茎上的薄套，用于避孕或预防性传播感染。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: He always carries a rubber just in case.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 他总是带着一个避孕套以防万一。

MEANINGS.POS_TIP: A noun is a word (other than a pronoun) used to identify any of a class of people, places, or things, or to name a particular one of these.
MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A match of three or five games in card games (especially bridge), won when one player or team has won a majority of the games.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 在纸牌游戏（尤其是桥牌）中，由三局或五局组成的比赛，当一方玩家或团队赢得多数局时获胜。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: They played a challenging rubber of bridge after dinner.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 晚饭后，他们玩了一局充满挑战的桥牌。

REGISTER: General (for material and eraser), Informal (for condom), Specific (for card games).
